last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 20
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ma Roo's head injury sends him to the hospital, and in the process makes things right.

name: The Innocent Man
overview: A self-made medical student and an aspiring anchorwoman find their friendship -- and their dreams -- tested by a fateful tragedy.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Ma Roo is studying to become a doctor when a shocking accident leads him to sacrifice his future.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Jae Hee's attempt to extricate Ma Roo from her life goes horribly wrong.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Eun Ki feels unusually indebted to Jae Hee when he saves a special possession from an accident. Jae Hee takes the chance to make a startling proposal to Eun Ki, one that might bring him closer to Jae Hee's world.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Eun Ki introduces Jae Hee to her family. The confrontational first meeting leads Eun Gee's father to make a decision that will pit his daughter against his wife.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Ma Ru shrewdly finds a way to prevent Aomori resort from being sold off. Jae Hee attempts to keep Eun Ki and Ma Ru from getting closer together.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Initially kicking Jae Hee out in an act of rage, the President gives her a chance to get her job back.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Eun Gee is torn when she discovers Ma Roo's past relationship with Jae Hee. Meanwhile, Jae Hee makes a bold move to extricate Ma Roo from her life once and for all.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The tables turn now that Chairman Seo has discovered of Jae Hee's duplicity. Jae Hee scrambles to recover from the shocking blow.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Two unexpected tragedies shake up the players' agendas and put Tae San's future into question.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: One year later, despite Eun Gee's disappearance, Jae Hee is still hindered by her influence at Tae San. Jae Hee searches for a way rid herself of Eun Gee's shadow.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Jae Hee makes plans for Tae San in Eun Gee's absence.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Eun Gee's return to Tae San is extremely surprising and causes many snags for Jae Hee's plans.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Eun Gee struggles to regain her lost memories at the price of discovering the most painful ones first.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: As Jae Hee schemes to expose Eun Gee's secrets to the public, Eun Gee falls into a dangerous trap.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Eun Gee's old flame returns, threatening Ma Roo's hold on Tae San.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Eun Gee begins to recovers bits and pieces of her memory while Ma Roo finds life has dealt him a fatal blow.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Having recovered her memory, Eun Gee tests those are around her, unable to trust anyone, including Ma Roo.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: As Eun Gee tries to forget Ma Roo, Ma Roo declares his love for Jae Hee to protect the one he truly loves.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Secretary Hyun's sudden accident reaffirms Eun Gee's determination to get to the bottom of the conspiracy behind her father's scandal.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Ma Roo's head injury sends him to the hospital, and in the process makes things right.
